name: 林敏勝
objective: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
schedule:
Week 1,2   Basic Concepts
Week 3,4   Arrays and Structures
Week 5,6   Stacks and Queues
Week 7,8   Linked Lists
week 9     Midterm 
Week 10,11 Trees
Week 12,13 Graphs
Week 14,15 Sorting
Week 16,17 Hashing
week 18    Final
materials: Fundamentals of Data Structures in C, 2nd Edition, by Horowitz, Sahni, and Anderson-Freed, Silicon Press
